body.name: MONDAY Haircare Volume Shampoo 12oz for Thin, Fine, and Oily Hair, Made from Coconut Oil, Ginger Extract, & Vitamin E, 100% Recyclable Bottles (354ml), Pink (10428)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 34 mins
features: VOLUME SHAMPOO: This award-winning formula helps invigorate and deeply cleanse thin, fine and oily hair types. It contains Ginger Extract, Vitamin E and Coconut Oil to leave hair feeling full and balanced.

SALON-QUALITY: Our modern formulas are dermatologically tested, PH-balanced, and free from SLS, parabens and phthalates. We instead use natural ingredients such as shea butter, coconut oil, rice protein and vitamin E to nourish and restore.

AWARD-WINNING: Our range of Shampoo and Conditioner has 11 major beauty awards and counting, including a Cosmopolitan 2021 Holy Grail Beauty Award, Glamour 2021 Beauty Award, Cosmopolitan 2021 Beauty Award, and an InStyle 2022 Best Beauty Buy Award.

CERTIFIED CRUELTY-FREE: All of MONDAY’s products are approved as cruelty-free under the Leaping Bunny programme by Cruelty Free International. We’re also proud to be recognised by PETA as a brand that does not test on animals.

100% RECYCLABLE BOTTLES: Not only do our little pink bottles look great in your shower, they’re made from 100% recyclable plastic to help minimise carbon footprint and reduce landfill. A win for your hair and for the environment.
body.description: MONDAY Haircare VOLUME Shampoo for women is good for oily hair, hair with product build-up and thin and fine hair types. It’s also safe for color-treated hair. This invigorating and deeply cleansing Shampoo helps to balance hair with Ginger Extract, Vitamin E and Coconut Oil—ingredients that help support hair health and maintain normal hair growth and thickness. For best results, use with MONDAY Haircare VOLUME Conditioner. MONDAY Haircare’s salon-quality Shampoo and Conditioner formulas are dermatologically tested, PH-balanced, and free from SLS, parabens and phthalates. They instead contain premium natural ingredients such as shea butter, coconut oil, rice protein, vitamin E and provitamin B5 to nourish and restore. Our range of Shampoo and Conditioner has close to a dozen major beauty awards, including a Cosmopolitan 2021 Holy Grail Beauty Award, Glamour 2021 Beauty Award, Cosmopolitan 2021 Beauty Award, and an InStyle 2022 Best Beauty Buy Award. MONDAY has also been featured by Vogue, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, Allure, Refinery29 and Byrdie. All of MONDAY’s products are approved as cruelty-free under the Leaping Bunny programme. We’re also proud to be recognised by PETA as a brand that does not test on animals. Our pink bottles are also made from 100% recyclable plastic to help minimise carbon footprint and reduce landfill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My hair feels very clean after, no left over residue. The smell is very floral smelling. I like this shampoo. Its great for my hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for fine hair!
reviews.reviewText: Compared Monday Haircare volume, OGX Thick & Full Biotin, Biotin Hair Shampoo Volumizing, and Moroccanoil Moisture Repair shampoos on very fine hair that was dry, damaged and brittle. Monday has a nice scent and performed the BEST in repairing fine hair with added volume too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is my second bottle and so far I am happy with the results. I like that the shampoo lathers well compared to others and has wholesome ingredients. The bottle design is also aesthetically pleasing and I find that the product leaves my hair with more volume days after wash day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good product but I can't do that scent
reviews.reviewText: I maybe am being a little harsh. The bottle is cute, the pump works well, great price, and its not a bad product. Unfortunately the smell reminds me of the shampoo my sister used to use on the issue-laden poodle she had when we were kids. I just cannot when it comes to the scent of this shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Monday Hair Care's Volume Control shampoo truly lives up to its promise, effectively boosting the volume and richness of hair. Initially purchased for my wife, who was experiencing a receding hairline and hair loss, we've seen noticeable improvements in the fullness of her hair since incorporating this product into her routine. It's important to clarify that while this shampoo doesn't promote hair growth, it significantly enhances the appearance of density and volume, making it an excellent alternative for those seeking a non-medicinal approach to hair thinning. Unlike treatments like Minoxidil, which can come with their own set of concerns and side effects, Monday Hair Care offers a gentler solution. For anyone looking to combat hair thinness without resorting to more aggressive treatments, this product presents a valuable option. Its ability to deliver a visible increase in volume and a richer hair texture without the need for pharmaceutical interventions is something we've greatly appreciated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kind big bottle haha
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this shampoo for a month. It is a good shampoo, cleans my hair very well.I usually wash my hair every other day if I didn’t go out, I don’t feel my hair become oily if I don’t wash my hair second day by using this shampoo. ( some shampoo does not clean well because if I washed hairs yesterday but didn’t wash today it will looks oil)Recently I have been washing my hair every day because I started doing exercise every day. It make me sweating so have to wash hair and take shower after it. Normally if I wash hair every other days I wash twice with shampoo, but since I wash my hair every day now I only wash ones and my hairs feel clean too.Scent: it smells so good, floral scent, not specific rose scent, more like combination of different flowers. The scent is very strong when just pump out from the bottle, but after washing and rinsing all the bobbles after cleaning hair, not much scents left on the hair, only very light scented.Softness: my own hair is very soft and smooth, so they are soft with almost all shampoos. Lol only one thing need to mention is this shampoo make hairs feel not soft after rinsing, but when hairs all completely dry, they become very soft and smooth again. ( I notice most all pricy shampoo I have used does the same. They don’t perform like drugstore shampoo) which is very interesting.Before I purchase this one I felt it is pricy as an unknown brand, but still purchased it because I really like the packaging. After I received it I was like wow, really a big bottle definitely good size for the price, good value for the money.Overall I am very happy with this purchase and thinking to buy their condition and different purpose shampoos as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT for oily hair AT ALL
reviews.reviewText: Smells good, great price but left my hair a greasy, stringy mess. I’ve used it 4 times and it is now going in the guest bathroom for guests who don’t bring shampoo. It’s probably great for normal to dry hair but it’s terrible for fine or oily hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my hair soft
reviews.reviewText: I love this Monday volume shampoo! I am a senior and my hair is fine and a little frizzy on top but since I started using this shampoo, my feels soft and smooth and is much nicer to style!! This is the ONLY shampoo and conditioner for me!! LOVE IT!!
